# OpenWrt智能、自动、透明翻墙路由器教程

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/openwrt-zhineng-zidong-touming-fanqiang-luyouqi-jiaocheng
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/openwrt-zhineng-zidong-touming-fanqiang-luyouqi-jiaocheng
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install openwrt-zhineng-zidong-touming-fanqiang-luyouqi-jiaocheng
openwrt-zhineng-zidong-touming-fanqiang-luyouqi-jiaocheng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g openwrt-zhineng-zidong-touming-fanqiang-luyouqi-jiaocheng
openwrt-zhineng-zidong-touming-fanqiang-luyouqi-jiaocheng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
